definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: gong1 neng2 xing4 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4

sentences.english: Parts for public use and functional segments are the pleas of industri…
sentences.chinese: 公用性和功能性内容是外观设计专利侵权的抗辩事由。

sentences.english: A seemingly inflexible adherence to specific, nonfunctional routines or rituals
sentences.chinese: 僵化地坚持某些特定，非功能性的生活习惯或仪式。

sentences.english: The system developers are paying particular attention to functionality and user friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员特别强调了系统的功能性和可操作性。

sentences.english: The body begins to break, you get the loss of P-functioning.
sentences.chinese: 身体开始损坏时，就失去人格功能性。

sentences.english: This paper introduces professor Cai Gan's clinical experience in the differentiation and treatment of functional constipation.
sentences.chinese: 介绍蔡淦教授治疗功能性便秘的经验。

sentences.english: It proved that the Caulis polygoni multiflori flavonoids was a kind of good functional peptides mixture.
sentences.chinese: 证明首乌藤黄酮是一种良好的抗氧化功能性化合物。

sentences.english: Q14. Can functional features of a design be protected in Australia?
sentences.chinese: 在澳大利亚，外观设计的功能性特征能够得到保护吗？

sentences.english: We want to know, can they engage in P-functioning?
sentences.chinese: 我们想知道，他们能从事人格功能性行为吗？

sentences.english: Conclusion System desensitization therapy is an effective treatment for functional gastrointestinal disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论系统脱敏疗法是治疗功能性胃肠病的有效方法。

sentences.english: One key issue is when to do NFT?
sentences.chinese: 一个关键的问题是何时进行非功能性测试。

sentences.english: These packages divide the problem domain into different functional areas.
sentences.chinese: 这些包将问题域分割成不太的功能性区域。

sentences.english: Take somebody who is in a coma, not engaged in P-functioning.
sentences.chinese: 就拿昏迷中的人来说，没有人格功能性。

sentences.english: Objective To comprehend the diagnostic value of defecography to the functional outlet obstruction constipation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨排粪造影对功能性出口便秘的诊断价值。

sentences.english: This ownership allows someone to be responsible to maintain the nonfunctional qualities of your services.
sentences.chinese: 此所有关系使得有人负责维护非功能性服务质量。

sentences.english: Identify the functionality included in the estimate.
sentences.chinese: 识别包含在评估中的功能性。
他们再度拥有人格功能性。

definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
